segments.text: I notice the open window first, nice view of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the sink is a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes, so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worry for her, slipping hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool, reaching high for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, plate in one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eager, arm up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids being kids, but this is risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor adds to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside seems so tidy and safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
